metadata.title: CVE-2023-52841 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: vidtv: mux: Add check and kfree for kstrdupAdd check for the return value of kstrdup() and return the errorif it fails in order to avoid NULL pointer dereference.Moreover, use kfree() in the later error handling in order to avoidmemory leak.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
